QuestData.Title: Urgent News
QuestData.Description: I'm sure Aysa won't love this plan, but it's the only plan we've got. Would you mind being the bearer of bad news for me, $n? She needs to know what we're doing so she can get everyone to safety.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Delora Lionheart at the Wreck of the Skyseeker.
QuestData.RewardText: Your friend is out fighting to save my crew. Fiercely I might add. I'm afraid your message may have to wait.
